mapper.update: update student set active=false where stu_id=#{stuId}
mapper.select: select S.stu_id, S.stu_number, S.name, S.phone, S.sex, S.major, S.year, S.class_num, S.active as stu_active, D.dormitory_id, D.dormitory_number, D.totals, D.active as dormitory_active from student S left join dormitory D on S.dormitory_id=D.dormitory_id and D.active=true where stu_id=#{stuId} and S.active=true
